description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and decentralized innovation. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his interdisciplinary approach, covering topics from digital landscapes and societal metaphors to practical innovation strategies and valuing differences. His vision combines technological advancement with sustainable, human-centered design principles.
blurb: yeehaa: PhD philosopher turned ecosystem architect. Blends tech, education, and innovation to reshape digital landscapes. Explores decentralized systems, internet fragmentation, and sustainable design. Advocates for inclusive, impactful internet ecosystems from Taipei.
